arts.ttl: Juventus Make Another Bid For Fikayo Tomori Amid Milan’s Interest in Kyle Walker
arts.sum: Juventus are raising their efforts to acquire Milan's English centre-back Fikayo Tomori. The club are expected to ramp up discussions with both Milan and Tomori in the coming hours, aiming to finalize a deal that would see the player move to Turin. arts.ttl: “We Must Have More Hunger”: Conceição Reflects on Milan’s Defeat to Juventus
arts.sum: After AC Milan's 2-0 defeat to Juventus, head coach Sergio Conceição shared his candid thoughts on the team's performance during a post-match interview with DAZN. The loss, marked by second-half goals from Mbangula and Weah, left Milan in eighth place with 31 points, while Juventus surged into a Champions League spot with 37 points.
